description: Ambassador Edge Stack dashboard for Prometheus

panels.description: Graph of allows and denials by Web Application Firewalls

targets.expr: sum(increase(waf_allowed_breakdown_total[1m])) without (container, endpoint, instance, job, namespace, operation, otel_scope_name, otel_scope_version, pod, service, waf_name)
sum(increase(waf_denied_breakdown_total{operation="request"}[1m])) without (container, endpoint, instance, job, namespace, otel_scope_name, otel_scope_version, pod, service, status, waf_name)
sum(increase(waf_denied_breakdown_total{operation="response"}[1m])) without (container, endpoint, instance, job, namespace, otel_scope_name, otel_scope_version, pod, service, status, waf_name)

panels.title: WAF Requests

panels.description: Keeps track of latency added to requests and responses by WAF processing.
panels.title: WAF Process Time

panels.description: Number of WebApplicationFirewall resources loaded across all pods.

targets.expr: sum(waf_created_wafs) without (container, endpoint, instance, job, namespace, operation, otel_scope_name, otel_scope_version, pod, service, waf_name)

panels.title: Loaded WAFs

title: Ambassador Edge Stack
